name: U.S. Global Investors, Inc.
description: U.S. Global Investors, Inc. is an investment management firm specializing in global markets and a wide range of investment strategies. Founded in 1968 by Frank Holmes, the company focuses on providing clients with innovative financial solutions in areas such as emerging markets, natural resources, and sustainable investments. U.S. Global Investors is well-known for its expertise in the gold and precious metals sector, offering a suite of mutual funds and exchange-traded funds (ETFs) that cater to investors seeking to capitalize on global economic trends and commodity cycles. The firm's investment philosophy is grounded in thorough research and a commitment to transparency, aiming to build long-term relationships with clients by aligning their interests with those of the investors. U.S. Global Investors also emphasizes education and communication, providing clients with market insights and investment strategies through various channels. With a focus on responsible investing, the firm is dedicated to incorporating environmental, social, and governance (ESG) factors into its investment process. U.S. Global Investors continues to navigate the evolving financial landscape, leveraging its extensive experience and market knowledge to deliver value to investors worldwide.

key_executives.name: Katherine R. G. D. G. E. H. K. C.

products: U.S. Global Go Gold and Precious Metal Miners ETF
